name: Storvakal
text: Githzerai strive for inner harmony, a blending of physical capacities, knowledge, and strength of the soul. They use a variety of methods to acquire this enlightenment. Among these is a cycle of quieting the mind and then returning to physical activity.

features.rebalancedMind(11thLevel): Reduce the total penalty you are taking to your attack rolls, skill checks, or ability checks by 2
features.restoringAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can roll a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end
features.mindBar(16thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against charm, fear, and psychic attacks

flavorText: My inner harmony puts the outer world at my service.
